results.description: Lauren Williams and Bianca Walkden secure gold medals at the inaugural European Taekwondo Games in Italy.
results.shortTitle: Walkden and Williams win golds in Italy
results.title: European Taekwondo Games: Bianca Walkden and Lauren Williams win gold medals

thumbnail.altText: A split image of British taekwondo athletes Bianca Walkden (left) and Lauren Williams (right) celebrating on the podium after winning tournaments

results.description: Great Britain's Bianca Walkden and Lauren Williams have to settle for silver at the World Taekwondo Grand Prix final in Bulgaria.
results.shortTitle: Walkden & Williams earn silver in Sofia
results.title: Bianca Walkden & Lauren Williams earn World Taekwondo Grand Prix silver in Sofia

results.description: Britain's two-time world medallist Damon Sansum retires, ending his bid to qualify for the Tokyo 2020 Olympics.
results.title: Damon Sansum retires from taekwondo

results.description: Bianca Walkden wins silver after a golden-point loss to arch rival Zheng Shuyin in the World Taekwondo Grand Prix final in Japan.
results.shortTitle: Walkden beaten by arch rival Zheng
results.title: Bianca Walkden beaten by arch rival Zheng Shuyin in Grand Prix final in Japan

results.description: Amrou Greenidge, 18, died two days after his bike was hit by a car in south-west London.
results.shortTitle: Two charged with former GB athlete murder
results.title: Two charged with murder of former GB athlete in Fulham

results.description: World champion Jade Jones says winning a third Olympic title in Tokyo next year will make her a legend in her sport.
results.shortTitle: Jones aims to be Olympic legend in Tokyo
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Jade Jones chases Olympic taekwondo hat-trick

results.description: Olympian Pita Taufatofua shows you how to build the upper body of a Tongan warrior as part of our #WorkoutWednesday series.
results.shortTitle: Workout Wednesday: The topless Tongan's tutorial
results.title: #WorkoutWednesday: Olympian Pita Taufatofua's topless Tongan tutorial

results.description: Angel Stevens, 17, won gold at the International Taekwon-Do Federation World Championships in 2016.
results.shortTitle: Taekwondo star Angel unbowed by disability
results.title: Taekwondo black belt Angel Stevens 'feels strong' despite disability

results.description: Great Britain's Bradly Sinden and Mahama Cho both win bronze medals at the Taekwondo Grand Prix in Rome.
results.title: Taekwondo: Britain's Sinden and Cho win bronze at Rome Grand Prix

thumbnail.altText: Bradly Sinden at the World Taekwondo Championships

results.description: Newly crowned world champion Jade Jones says winning a third Olympic title in Tokyo next year will be her ultimate dream.
results.title: Jade Jones: New world taekwondo champion chases Olympic hat-trick

results.description: British fighter Mahama Cho's bid to reach the Tokyo Olympics is hit by a quarter-final exit in the +87kg heavyweight division at the World Championships.
results.title: Mahama Cho suffers World Championships quarter-final exit

results.description: Watch double Olympic champion Jade Jones win the first World Taekwondo title of her career with a 14-7 victory over defending champion Lee Ah-reum.
results.shortTitle: GB's Jade Jones wins her first World Taekwondo title
results.title: World Taekwondo Championships: Watch Jade Jones win her first world title

results.description: Double Olympic champion Jade Jones secures the first world title of her career with a 14-7 victory over defending champion Lee Ah-reum.
results.shortTitle: Jubilant Jones wins first world title
results.title: World Taekwondo Championships: Jade Jones wins first world title

results.description: Great Britain's Bianca Walkden wins a third world title as China's Zheng Shuyin is left in tears after being disqualified.
results.title: World Taekwondo Championships: Bianca Walkden win leaves Zheng Shuyin in tears

results.description: Watch as Bradly Sinden, 20, becomes Britain's first male world taekwondo champion, beating Spain's Javier Perez Polo 24-21 in the -68kg final in Manchester.
results.shortTitle: Sinden becomes Britain's first male world taekwondo champion
results.title: World Taekwondo Championships: Bradly Sinden makes history in Manchester

results.description: Bianca Walkden secures her third successive World Taekwondo title after a controversial finish to the women's heavyweight final in Manchester.
results.shortTitle: GB's Walkden claims controversial world title win
results.title: World Taekwondo Championships: Bianca Walkden win leaves Zheng Shuyin in tears

results.description: The 2019 Taekwondo World Championships take place in Manchester - watch live coverage.
